Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: it's just that quick feedback is always available and you can discuss methods for improvement directly

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: genai usually leaves more detailed feedback and tries to highlight positive factors of the work to create a good feeling

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: of course, the teacher ultimately evaluates the work and therefore knows better than any ai what he wants to see
